1.content: Welcome to the Rugrats Blueberry Inflation interactive story! where you can turn any of your favorite Babies from Rugrats into a Blueberry or any other fruit like in Willy Wonka and the chocolate factory! Which Character would you like to start with?
1.title: Which Character?

11.content: You have Chosen Tommy Pickles! What story would you like to Write about the bravest leader of the gang of Babies ending up as a blueberry?
11.title: Tommy Pickles

choices: Pulling the cap off causing the formula to splash on him
Pulls the cap off and starts to drink some
111.content:
"D I've done it!"Stu yells from his workshop as he run upstairs, "I've done it!" "What have you done Stu?"Didi asks, humoring her husband, he said this sort of thing every other day and only about 25 percent of the time did he actually do what he set off to do. "I've made the perfect scented doll."He yells holding up a little doll wearing a blueberry themed outfit, "Go on smell her, she smells just like fresh blueberries." Didi begins to sniff the doll and to her shock it did smell just like blueberries, even better then any scented marker. "Wow Stu,"Didi replies in shock, "it really does smell like blueberries!"

"It's all thanks to this!"Stu replies holding up a vile of blue liquid, "One drop of this on her clothes and they smell like blueberries, only for a day but with some fine tuning I can make it last 10 times as long." He places it down on the table in front of Tommy's highchair. "After tomorrows presentation we will be set for months!"He laughs in glee as he races back downstairs before a loud crash is heard. "Stu honey are you ok?"Didi asks heading downstairs to check on him.

"Bwuberries?"Tommy asks himself as he reaches for the vial and examines it, "My daddy musta made special bwueberry juice."He begins to try to pull the cap off to give what he thought was juice a try. "This must be extwa special juice."He groans before.......
111.title: Bluebabies

choices: The change happens the same day
It happens when he wakes up
1111.content:
Tommy gives it one last strong tug before the cap pops off causing some of the formula to splash right on his face. "Yay I did it!"He cheers before hearing his mom and dad coming back up the stairs. "I keep telling you not to get so excited Stu."Didi sighs as she enters the kitchen with Stu, who was rubbing his head, close behind. "I know D but my genius gets the better of me."Stu laughs before looking at Tommy and seeing the vial in his hand. "Tommy no!"He quickly grabs the bottle from him and recaps it, not even noticing that some of had vanished, "This is not for babies." "You have to be more careful where you put that stuff Stu."Did replies as she picks Tommy up and carries him to his playpen. "Don't worry D,"Stu replies as he heads to the basement door, "this little gem is completely safe." "Uh huh,"She sighs, "that is what you said about adding flames to the Reptar parade float." She follows him name off invention after invention.

"Ahhhh," Tommy pouts, "I didn't get to try any of the Bwueberry juice."Little did he know that the small amount that splashed on his was already changing his body. His dad was right, this stuff wasn't for babies but it also wasn't safe for humans in general. Tommy's dad had effectively created a chemical that could alter a person's genetic structure if they received a big enough does and for a baby a splash on the face was more then enough. The question wasn't if Tommy was gonna change, it was when.
1111.title: Pulling the cap off causing the formula to spla...

choices: Stu hopes he found something to help
11111.content:
While in is playpen, Tommy felt strange. He shrugged it off and kept playing with Dil unaware that he was becoming a blueberry. Didi came out to check on her son and spotted a blue spot on him. It was right on his nose and she tried to whip it off but couldn’t.

“I must just be seeing things.” Didi said.

She put him back in the playpen and went to check on Stu. The blue coloring spread across his face and down his body until he and his shirt and diaper were all blue. Didi came back to check on her sons and saw what Tommy had become. She let out a scream of horror and the sight of what happened. Stu came and looked at Tommy.

“I guess he is becoming a blueberry now.” Stu said.

“Is there a way to reverse this?” Didi asked.

“I don’t know for sure. I can try.”

Stu went back downstairs to figure out how to reverse this. This one bit didn’t bother Tommy. He kept going like normal and Didi kept an eye on him. She was worried that something was going to happen to him. She didn’t like what going on and hoped that Stu could find something to help before things go bad for Tommy. He kept playing with Dil and soon the others when they arrive.
11111.title: The change happens the same day

choices: Oh now it spread to his brother!
111111.content:
Didi was helpless to watch the events that unfolded before her eyes to her own child. It started soon after his father left to go get help.It started once his whole body had change in his colour to blue with different shades of blue spots all long his body. Even his diaper and clothes were stained blue as it seem he start sweating quite hard. The sweat it self was blue too! and sticky, with a sweet taste of blue berries! Seem this juice like sweat had soaked into his clothes and turned it that color.

The color of his skin was hardly the worse of it, at lest to tommy himself. He whined and stop playing as something felt off his tommy it was sort of like gas, in the sense it was pressure inside him. His tummy was bloated up but not out of the normal, it seem all in all like a case of gas. However this was not the case as normally it would have let down by now escaping from the top or bottom of his body. Now in fact it got worse his belly was jetting out more and more, it start off as not something one could easily spot but soon it got worse.

Now one could see as his belly swell up forcing his shirt upwards as his belly went out. Soon it seem to spread up as his chest start to go out his belly, getting round and smooth. Why looking his nipples had disappear! it was just round and smooth there. His shirt tore off in all this, reaching a point where it just ripped apart. It was around the point his neck disappeared around the rounding and bloating top half, just gone under all this round body mass. His head was still viewable but his mouth was start to get covered up too.

Soon his bottom half joined too, inflating much faster to catch up. His diaper had slid off or ripped during the process revealing from his privates to what was his butt had disappeared. It wasn't that they were hidden by his body mass like his neck it was like they were gone, just smooth blue flesh there.

His limbs widen out like the balloons one use to made animal shapes. However in getting wide they retracted pulling into the the great circle shape that was tommy body now. His fingers did much the same, sucking into the big roundness that was his palm at one point. At this point . . .
111111.title: Tommy begins to slowly expand

choices: They meet Pauski (The owner of the factory)
112.content:
It was a wonderful day at the Pickles house. In the Pickles house's backyard, The mother and father of Phil and Lil Deville named Betty and Howard Deville were helping their friends prepare for a barbeque party. Betty was placing two large bowls of sweet and mashed potatoes. Howard was mixing up the ingredients of the recipe of a salad.

As Howard was mixing the ingredients, The wind picked up some of the salad and the wind made the flying salad land on his face.

Drew and Stu Pickles were cooking and flipping some burgers on the Barbeque Grill.

A little late in the season for this. Don't you agree, bro? Asked Drew.

What is the matter? Scared of a little wind? Asked Stu as he flipped the burger that was on his spatula. As he did, The wind came back and made the burger fly and land on Howard's plate full of hamburger holders or Buns for short.

One of the buns flew off the plate and on to the grass. Phil Deville grabbed the bun and came back to his friends that were hiding under the lunch table.

I so much like barbeques. You get to play with your food. Said Tommy Pickles.

Toss the bug salad, Chuckie. Said Lil Deville.

Coming right up! Said Chuckie.

You are not really going to eat this. Are you? Asked Chuckie.

I am. Answered Phil.

Phil put the worm on his hamburger bun and just as he was about to take a bite, Angelica took the food from Phil. As she took a bite, she saw the worm, She let a low scream. It made the Tommy, Chuckie, Lil and Phil, Kimi and Dil laugh.

As the babies laughed, They heard Drew pickles scream "Yippee"!

Hey, guys! Look at what I found! Drew cried.

The babies crawled from the table and saw Drew holding in his hands a golden ticket.

This is a golden ticket to a candy factory! Cried Drew.

Not just a candy factory! Philip Pauaki's Candy factory! Cried Lulu.

I heard of that candy factory. It is very a mystery. Said Betty.

You mean very expansive. Said Stu.

With this golden ticket, it's a hundred percent free! Said Lou.

Plus you get to take whoever you want. Said Drew.

So what do you say? It will be a great trip. Said Lulu

Ah. What the heck? why not?

Betty turned to the babies. Hey, pups! We are going to a candy factory and that is going to be fun! She cried.

A day later...
112.title: Story 2

1121.content:
...They meet Pauski, the owner of the factory. He greeted them at the front gate and brought them all in.

“It’s great to meet the winners of the tickets. Just be careful with everything in the factory.” Pauski said.

They went in and went on the tour. The babies enjoyed the tour and wondered off a bit when they stopped. Tommy liked it and wondered if he could try some of the candy. He munched on a bit of it and was grabbed by Didi before he could get too far from her. In one of the rooms, Tommy spotted a…
1121.title: They meet Pauski (The owner of the factory)

113.content:
It was a beautiful day at the town's park.

There was a swing set for kids to swing on, Slides to slide down in the playground, a lot of bushes to play hiding games, and lots of other playful things to see and do in the park.

At the park's sidewalk, Grandpa Lou was running for some daily exercises and to keep the man of his age in good health.

A Bald baby named Tommy Pickles was riding on his father's father chest in a baby carrier that works like a book bag.

After Completing the 15 minutes of working out, Grandpa Lou exhausted, but awake walked to the wooden table that had Tommy's Diaper Bag and Lou's exercise equipment bag.

"And That is how you exercise, My little Grandson." Said Lou.

Lou added " That reminds me of a time that i was healthy as i was when i was in France in WW2." A few minutes before he fell asleep... I stay up for 15 days in a row and we liked it!

After Saying Tiredly, Lou began to close his eyes and started to snore.

Tommy watched as his grandfather fell fully asleep. Tommy though that now was the time to explore the park. Sure enough, He did.

Tommy quietly sneaked away from the table.

"I wonder if there is anything to eat around here." Said Tommy in wonder.

All of a sudden, a sweet smell made it into Tommy's nose. Tommy though the smell was so sweat, That Tommy walked straight to where it was coming from.

Tommy saw that the smell was coming a small bush.

Tommy moved from branches to the inside of the bush.

What he saw was the source of the smell.

A healthy bright Blueberry was hanging from a branch. Tommy grabbed and then pulled off the berry from the branch. He examined it.

Tommy never ate a blueberry in his life.

Tommy realized that this was going to be the first time.

Tommy then placed The Blueish Berry in his mouth without chewing on it.

Tommy did not realize that the berry was going to change his life.

Tommy decided that it was time to head back to his grandfather.

Before He fully got out of the bush, He saw a...
113.title: Story 3

choices: Tommy and the Blueberry milk bottle

14.content: You have selected Lil Deville! The twin sister of Phil Deville! what story would you like for Lil Deville to end up as a blueberry?
14.title: Lil Deville

choices: Lil has a secret plan to cheat...
141.content:
Phil, Lil, Tommy, Chuckie and Kimi were all together inside of the playpen thinking of things to do. The normal ring leader, Tommy, was tapped out of ideas and they were all playing as normal inside of the pen. But they were still bored... that was until Lil had a bright idea.

"Let's have a compestition!" Lil yelled out. She obviously meant "Competition" but the rest of the babies nodded in agreement, bright smiles on their faces as they agreed it was a good idea.

"Yeah! But what?" Tommy replied

"Who can eat the most bugs!" Phil butted in, Kimi shook her head in reply, "Nuh uh... you'd win for sure!" she replied, folding her arms.

"How about... who can make their diapee the biggest!" Lil chimed in. Most of the babies nodded to each other in agreement once again, it was the best idea they could think of that's for sure.

"My diapee's gonna be a blimp!" Kimi patted the butt of her white padding with some sort of pride. "Nuh uh, mine is gonna crush the whole town!" Phil sat on a toy Reptar for emphasis, chuckling to himself. Tommy settled the babies down.

"Okay, whoever comes back in with biggest diapee wins... okay?" The babies agreed. "...Go!" Tommy said, unhooking the latch on the pen with his trusty plastic screwdriver.
141.title: Competiton

152.content: You have selected Angelica Pickles! The mean Cousin of Tommy and Dil Pickles. What story would you make to turn Her into a blueberry?
152.title: Angelica Pickles

1521.content: Angelica was in her room playing around with her toys. Her mother entered the house with her hands filled with groceries "Kids I'm home" she called out. Angelica ran downstairs to see what she all brought home. When she got into the kitchen she saw her mom laying the bags onto the kitchen table having a couple items roll out of the bags onto the table. "Hi mom what did you all bring home" Angelica asked. "Oh hi sweetie, I just brought home some groceries for supper tonight" her mother told her "Did you bring home any candy" the little girl asked. "I'm sorry sweetie not this time" she told her. Once her mom got all the items in place she went out to the car to get the rest of the groceries. Angelica was a little bummed out. That is until something caught her attention from the corner of her eye which was what?
1521.title: Story 1

15212.content:
Angelica spotted a package of blueberries. She wanted to eat something and they looked tasty. She thought they were some kind of blue candy despite the fact her mother saying she didn't bring any candy home. She snuck them back to her room to eat.

"Time for this stuff to be in my tummy." Angelica said.

She began to eat them unaware of what's going to happen to her. She didn't know that of one would eat too many at once, that person would become a blueberry themselves. Angelica ate away still oblivious to what's going to happen. She kept eating away at the blueberries and how they tasted but didn't pay one bit of attention of what's going to happen to her from eating

"These are super tasty. She should get more of these." Angelica said.

She finished off the package and enjoyed it. Looking at the package, she couldn't easily understand but saw the word blueberry written across the label. She enjoyed them and wants more. Inside her belly, the blueberries were reacting in her and would eventually turn her into one.
15212.title: package of blueberries

choices: Angelica gets a hold of more
152122.content:
Angelica continued to eat away at the blueberries still unaware of what's going to happen. She just kept eating more and more until she felt something within. Thinking nothing of it, Angelica kept eating away. When there was nothing left in the container, Angelica finally stopped. She was still hungry but didn't get anymore to eat.

"Man that was good. What kind of candy was this?" Angelica said.

Despite being the one that can read in the ground of children, she could barely be classified as literate. She barely managed to make out the word blueberries on the package. She shrugged it off and got off her bed. Before going anywhere, Angelica felt and heard a rumbling coming from within her. Hitting her hands onto her belly, Angelica liked down and watched them be pushed out. It was slow and steady but still noticeable. When it stopped, her belly was sticking out a couple inches in front of her.

"Must have eaten more than thought." Angelica said.

She took off back to the kitchen to find something else to snack on. What she didn't know was that her mother knew this would happen and had a plan just in case. What she didn't know was what would happen and currently happening to Angelica. In the bag that had the package of blueberries Angelica took was more than just that one. In an, her mother actually got 20. They were unaware that a person could turn into a blueberry like Violet Beauregard. By the looks of it, it was beginning to happen with Angelica.
152122.title: She begins bloating up

1521222.content:
Angelica made her way to the kitchen to find her mother was at work on her computer like usual. Angelica thought she was in the clear and snuck into the kitchen. She saw the other packs of blueberries within her reach and took as many as she can.

"Got you in the act you little blueberry theft." Charlotte thought.

Angelica only managed to swipe 4 packs but that was enough for her for now. She began to eat them by the handful but stopped for a moment. Looking at her belly, Angelica watched it get bigger. The rest of her young body began getting bigger as well. This wasn't the growing up kind of growing but the bloating bigger kind. She shrugged it off as nothing and continued to eat more and more blueberries by the handful.

"These blueberries are tasty. They feel and taste great on my tummy." Angelica said.

She continued to eat until she was out again. Her body continue to expand more and more until it stopped. By now she looks like a beach ball with arms, let's and a head in a dress. She let out a sigh of satisfaction and fullness as she had her full. The question was how was going to get around and be normal now that she's a beach ball? She would figure that out soon enough, that is if she can be normal.
1521222.title: Angelica gets a hold of more

15212221.content:
Angelica enjoyed the feast of blueberries she had and how she low but soon enough she would become bigger and become a blueberry. Looking at herself and rubbing as much of her bloated belly, Angelica decided to get up. Unfortunately that wasn't easy or possible at this point. She kept trying until she exhausted herself out. She soon fell asleep for a quick nap before trying again.

"A little rest after a feast is perfect." Angelica said.

She quickly passed out and had a strange dream. She dreamt of eating nothing but blueberries and blueberry products. All she had to drink was blueberry juice and nothing else. Whenever she grabbed something else to eat or drink, it turned blue and tasted like blueberries. She even noticed that she was swelling up like a balloon the more she consumed to the point she turned blue and became a blueberry. She woke up from that and looked at herself.

"Thank goodness it was just a dream. Or not." Angelica said.

She clutched her belly as it let out a moan. She began to swell up even more and more like in her dream and earlier. Her belly was beginning to peak out between her pants and dress as she continued to get bigger and bigger. She felt her clothing getting tighter and tighter as well. This continued on for a minute before she stopped again. Angelica wasn't liking where this was going and felt like she couple pop from this. Her mother came in and saw what was becoming of Angelica. She can tell this was had but couldn't do much about it. Angelica asked if she couple poke her with a pin or something to let the and out but Charlotte tapped her be my a couple times and said it wasn't air. She even said that if she did, more that what's in her would come out. She said that want might happen would be the end of Angelica and a hard mess to clean.
15212221.title: Angelica bloats some more

choices: The others see Angelica as is
152122211.content:
After swing what became if Angelica, Charlotte knew something had to be done. She quickly called her doctor to see if there's anything that could be done. It took him a bit before he got there and saw the state Angelica was in. He checked her out and found something somewhat interesting.

"May I ask what she's been eating the most of lately?" The doctor asked.

"Well, she did take and eat 5 full packages of blueberries." Charlotte said.

"Ok than, I may have an idea about this. Due to her round figure, firm skin and her recent diet, Angelica is most likely becoming a blueberry."

When he said that, Angelica clutched her belly and let out a moan as she swelled up bigger. This was interesting for not only does eating nothing but blueberries turned her into a semi blueberry but just mentioning them around her does the same. He never seen anything like this but heard about it. He thought it was only in a movie where a girl went through something similar.

"I thought so as well. I guess she has to be juiced." Charlotte said.

"Not so soon or hastily. She must ripen first of the juices won't be good to sell or consume plus could be harmful to Angelica." The doctor said.

Her ripening could last a couple hours to possibly a week or two given how big she'll get and what could happen. Before he left, he said blueberry within ear shot of Angelica which caused her to moan and swell up. He left and Charlotte thought of what to do. What for her worried was the fact she could continuously expand bigger and bigger without stopping or ripening. There was the fear of Angelica popping from getting to big or worse. Time will tell before anything could happen. To have a laugh, Charlotte whispered blueberries in such a tone that Angelica shouldn't have heard. She did and got a little bigger. Which of that and trying to figure some thing out.
152122211.title: Angelica gets checked out

1521222111.content:
Charlotte got adjusted to the idea of her daughter being a blueberry and how it wasn't possible or easy to stop it now. Angelica mainly stays bed riden but does get up and love around a bit. It was a struggle but she manages. The challenge comes from all the juices swishing around in her and the weight.

"How's my blueberry doing?" Charlotte asked.

"Please stop saying that near me." Angelica moaned.

Charlotte rubbed her belly and gave her some food. Even though she was a semi blueberry and full of blueberry juice, she still needs to eat. She brought her blueberry packages, press, waffles, and other blueberry filled foods including blueberries themselves. Angelica enjoyed them and stuffed herself with all her mother brings. When finished, Angelica clutched her belly and let out a moan of discomfort.

"Too much. I might pop." Angelica moaned.

She began to swell up again to her discomfort. There was a slight stretching sound like clothing being stretched to it's limits. Angelica didn't like this and knew this would kill her. At this rate, Angelica would be to big for the house. She helped her up and out of her bed and outside. By now, Angelica had grown to the point her legs are useless and her feet are barely touching the ground. With the exception of her head and arms, Angelica was well rounded out and could pop. She stopped expanding and felt something was going to give. There was a gap between her dress and pants exposing a band of her midsection for the world to see. She couldn't tell if her clothes themselves were going to give or her body itself. Either way, something couldn't keep growing and will give out.
1521222111.title: Angelica bloats some more

15212221112.content:
With Angelica in the state she's in, who knows what could happen. Charlotte was forced to house her daughter in the garage. She did her best to take care of her bloated daughter but it wasn't ready, nor was it cheap. Then she got an idea.

"You want to do what with me?" Angelica asked.

"Keeping up and taking care of my little girl is getting pricy so showing you off will help bring in some money." Charlotte said.

"Will their blueberries?"

Angelica then held her belly and moaned in pain. She keeps forgetting that saying blueberry still makes her bigger. Charlotte said their would be plenty. They went to the county fair to show her off. They got her set up and a donation box out. People were attracted to her and loved how she looks. They donated to them and asked if they could take pictures with and of her, feed her or feel her. Charlotte let them for a fee. People paid up and they were making hundreds a hour. Angelica got use to it and liked it.
15212221112.title: Charlotte gets an idea

152122211123.content:
Angelica liked being showed off like she was some kind of prized cow but not how much of her body was exposed. But it couldn't be helped and Charlotte knew it. She did her best for her daughter and knew that she would become a full blueberry soon. Despite now being in somewhat illegal or just immoral territory, Charlotte set up a donation account and took a couple pictures of her daughter. This was making some extra money and people were even sending blueberries and blueberry products to them.

"How's my little girl doing?" Charlotte asked.

"Stuffed like a pig and ready to burst." Angelica said.

"You look that way."

Angelica let out a moan of discomfort and started to expand again. She rubbed her belly as much as she can whole it happened. She found her arm movements becoming slower and more restricted the bigger she got. Angelica looked at them and saw they were expanding like her body and sinking into it. While doing so, they stick straight out and up a bit from the juices. Charlotte couldn't do anything but watch her daughter blow up. Her cloths have out a disheartening stretching would as she continued to grow more and more until she was a good 10 feet in diameter. They didn't like this for moving her around and housing her will be a challenge. For now, they'll do what they can.
152122211123.title: She has a big bloat

1521222111232.content:
Angelica tried moving around in her current state but due to her size and how her feet were no longer touching the ground, that was impossible. Charlotte thought if what to do now and wondered if there was anything she could do. Her daughter was a blueberry and could easily explode. That's when it hit her. There was a movie where a girl blew up into a blueberry in a similar fashion before being rolled off to be juiced. The question was how.

"We better do something quick. I think I'm going to pop." Angelica moaned.

Juice bubbles up out of her mouth while she talked meaning she was losing it due to her size and inability to grow anymore. It was trying to force her bigger but her body wouldn't give an inch. Charlotte knew some one that could help and called them. They came that night and took Angelica to be juiced. She didn't like it and felt a bit disoriented from all the moving and the pressure within her. Last thing she remembered was being rolled into a large room before blacking out. Next thing she knew was that she was back at home and normal. Charlotte told her that she was out for a couple days after being juiced. They just hoped they don't witness her blue demise.
1521222111232.title: They juice her

15212221112321.content:
Angelica enjoyed her life the best she could, thankful that she didn't explode. She was quite flexible compared to before but can tell something was off. Charlotte was in another room unaware of what's about to happen to her daughter, again. Angelica shrugged it off for now and continued on. It soon came up again a bit stronger. It hit her on what's going on. She felt her belly filling up with blueberry juice again.

"Again? I guess this is my life." Angelica said.

She began swelling up again. It was mainly her belly and she didn't like it. Her dress stretched out with it and she didn't like it too much. It eventually stopped and she liked it while not liking it. She waddled out of the room to her mother who jumped at the sight. She felt it and knew that this was happening again. Though it could work with the amount of money they could make from her juice. They hoped she doesn't explode and she would possibly keep doing this for as long as possible.
15212221112321.title: Angelica starts swelling up again

choices: Charlotte gets a bit of an idea
15212222.content:
Angelica did her best to do what she can as a beach ball shaped blueberry girl but they were still competely unaware of how she was doing this or what's in her. Charlotte took her bloated daughter to the doctors to get her checked out. It was a shock to the others that saw her. It was a strange sight to see her like this but couldn't do a thing. After a thorough examination, it was found that the amount of blueberries she concumed had started filling her up with blueberry juices. Angelica would continue to grow bigger as well as turn completely blue until she's as big as a house. Once there and ripe, she would be able to be juiced and be relatively normal again.

"What do you mean she'll be relatively normal again?" Charlotte asked.

"She would be back to her normal figure and free of the jucies but she would be fairly flexible and completely blue. In fact, she's turning blue now." The doctor said.

Charlotte looked at her bloated daughter and watched a blue spot on her face grow out and down her body. Angelica watched as it happen as well and was a bit freaked out about it. If being as big as a beach ball and bloated as a beached whale full of blueberry juice was bad enough, she was becoming more and more like one. The blue coloroing eventually engulfed her entire body and even her dress. Every inch of Angelica's body was a deep shade of blue and she wasn't liking this.

"How could my daughter becoming like this?" Charlotte asked.

"The best guess I have is the high amount of blueberries she ate caused this." The doctor said.

If that was the cause, she might have to completely take it out of that and leave her to eat something else. That was the plan but Angelica has a strong urge to eat more blueberries. They got her out of the house and hopefully she doesn't explode.
15212222.title: She begins to turn blue

choices: Charlotte takes her to a fair
152122222.content:
Angelica got use to being a blue beach ball but not the fact that she was a blueberry. It was hard getting around on her own and with the help of her mother but she made due. Her legs felt like they were getting stronger from the weight of all the blueberry juice in her. One thing her mother did was get a large red belt and put it around her belly. This was a bit strange but she liked it. She remembered a movie that had a girl that was in the same condition as her in a factory with red belt. It snapped when she got too big for it and she thought that was going to happen to this one.

"That would be an interesting sight I thought I want to see before you get too big." Charlotte said.

"I see. Speaking of which, feel that's going to happen." Angelica said.

She put her hands onto her belly and watched her belly pushing out bigger. Her butt was getting bigger her and she strained to keep up on her feet. Her legs were getting thicker below her and she tried to move on them but the weight of them combined with her current size made that a struggle and soon impossible. She collapsed and was sitting on the ground still growing. The belt tightened more and more around her midsection and felt like it was going to pop her before popping off. Charlotte was still concerned for the health and well being of Angelica but not too much now.

"So full and belts so tight I might pop." Angelica said.

"You wouldn't. I can tell you'll stop growing all together and would be back to normal soon." Charlotte said.

Eventually she did stop and the belt was holding tight. She wasn't worried as she doesn't pop herself. It doesn't feel like that now but it might soon if she gets too big or if the belt doesn't give. Until then, she might as well enjoy this.
152122222.title: Angelica gets bigger

1521222222.content:
With the red belt holding firm around Angelica's waist and no way to get it off without popping her, Charlotte thought of what to do. There wasn't much but got an idea. It didn't seem she was going to get bigger any time soon got an idea.

"Be back in a bit." Charlotte said.

Charlotte left and came back a while later. She got blueberries and blueberry products like blueberry juice and blueberry pies. She began feeding her them and liked it. If her theory is correct, she should start swelling up again. If not, they tried. She put the rest away for later to Angelica's displeasure. But understood that it could be gone too soon if they kept feeding her like this.
1521222222.title: Charlotte feeds her more blueberries

choices: She eats a pack of gum
1522.content:
Angelica was lounging around at home with her favorite doll on hand with nothing to do. She eventually found an old movie from the 70s playing on a channel and it looked interesting. Part way through, Angelica watched a girl with a blue outfit and red belt turn completely blue and swell up like a balloon. The for her interesting on if a human can be turned into a blueberry.

"Doubt it. It's just a movie and can't happen in real life." Angelica said.

She was unaware that it could happen in real life. Though how might not be so straight forward like in the movie with something like a stick of gum. Even if it was, who would ever want to make such a thing for the public. For now, she just watched the movie before getting bored again when it ended.
1522.title: Story 2

15333333333333333.title: Other stories

154.content: You have Selected Kimi Finster! The step sister Of Chuckie Finster! What story would you like to make Her end up as a blueberry?
154.title: Kimi Finster

1541.content:
Kimi was precocious. Curious enough to wander off by herself in a large mall.

Her mother had left her alone in the play area whilst she looked for stuff for the rest of the family so she was on her own. A small play area and with not much to do, Kimi decided to take it upon herself to wander away from it. She walked away from the area and into the busy mall itself, but where to go to first...!?
1541.title: Alone in the Mall

15411.content:
The candy store. Kimi went in and looked at all the delicious candy that her young eyes can see.

“So much candy.” Kimi said.

She looked at all of them and wondered what to get. There were candy of all colors, sizes and shapes. She wondered around the store, looking at everything and wondered what to try them all. She tried getting some but they were all out of reach. Then she saw something that wasn’t out of reach for her short arms. It was on a low table and she went up to grab it. Once it was in her hands, Kimi admired its blue color and roundness. It looked like a normal blueberry but it smelt too sweet to be one.

“Sweet.” Kimi said.

She put the candy into her mouth and she liked it. It tasted like sweet blueberries and the sugary rush it gave her was a delight. The sweetness and deliciousness was too much for the girl that she couldn’t get over it. She kept enjoying it as best she could until her mother came.

“There you are Kimi. Don’t wonder off on me.” Kira said.

Kira picked up Kimi and continued on what they were doing. Kimi still had the candy in her mouth and Kiki wasn’t aware of that. Little did the little girl know that the candy was going to change her for some time. When it would take effect or how long it would last when it happens.
15411.title: The Candy Store

154112.content:
Kimi liked the taste of the candy she was eating and how sweet it was. Her mother kept her close to ensure she doesn’t wonder off again and get lost. With the blueberry candy still as delicious as it was when she first put it into her mouth, Kimi wondered when it would start losing its taste.

“Just a little longer and we’ll be heading home.” Kira said.

Kira kept doing what she had to do there while Kimi munched on the candy. When they were about to leave, Kira looked down at her daughter. When she did, she something off about her. Kira looked her daughter over and noticed her little nose has turned blue. She hurried and finished what she needed to do at the mall before heading home to Chucky and Chas. When she arrived, she put Kimi down and told Chas what’s going on. He came and looked at her.

“The blue has spread all over her face. Do you know what might have caused this?” Chas asked.

“Well, she did wonder off from me and I found her in the candy store. I think she might have eaten a piece of candy.” Kira said.

They hoped she was fine and she found Chucky. He jumped when he saw her face was completely blue. She told him that she feels fine and they played together. Chucky tried to ignore the fact that his new sister has a blue face. Soon, the rest of their gang showed up and noticed her change. To be sure that she doesn’t infect the others if it is contagious; Kira pulled out and put her in a separate pin to be sure. She didn’t like it and hoped that nothing was truly wrong.
154112.title: Kimi starts to change

choices: Kira keeps a closer eye on Kimi
1541121.content:
The spreading of Kimi’s blue coloring had slowed down quite a bit. It’s been a couple days since Kimi got the candy and started to change. By now, the blue coloring of her skin engulfed her whole head, turning not only her skin blue but her hair as well. It worked down her neck, shoulders and is covering her whole chest and around her back. It was a couple inches down her arms and is slowly working down her. She was checked out and the doctor couldn’t find anything wrong with her. The doctor told Kira and Chas to keep an eye on her and that there is nothing to worry about with putting her with others.

“Nothing to worry about Kimi. Even if you do become a blueberry, you’re still my little girl.” Kira said.

“If she really does start blowing up like a balloon and full of blueberry juice, we could use her juice at the store with our coffee and sell it separate to make a little more money.” Chas said.

“I don’t like the idea of my little girl being a blueberry cow. But if she as to be, then I guess I can live with it.”

Kira put Kimi with the others and they had their usual adventures. While playing, Kimi felt weird. It felt as if she was getting heavier. She looked down and saw her dress pushing out. She shrugged it off and continued with the others. She wasn’t aware that she was swelling up like a blueberry. When her belly was starting to poke out between her dress and diaper, she knew something was off. She waddled to her mother and she looked. Kira saw her daughter had swollen up and was worried. She picked her up and knew things were getting worse. Since the doctor said that there anything to be worried about, Kira was worrying any ways.

“I guess you’re just growing up as well as being a blueberry.” Kira said.

Kira kept Kimi with her to keep a close eye on her. She could feel Kimi getting heavier and pushing into her as she ballooned up slowly. She just let it happen for the doctor said she is filling up with blueberry juice and if juiced too early, it could cause harm to her body and health. So they must wait until she becomes a complete blueberry and ripen before juicing. How much longer that would take is unknown so it is just a waiting game.
1541121.title: Kimi starts to swell up

choices: Kira takes Kimi to the mall again
15411212.content:
Kimi liked the blue coloring of her head and upper body and the bloating she went through but it seemed weird to be this way. She currently looks like a basketball with a blue head, arms and legs. She was confirmed to have blueberry juice but wasn’t ripe enough to be juiced.

“So, bwueberry juice is in you?” Tommy asked.

“Yes and I need to ripe before I have it drained.” Kimi said.

“Man, I wish I found that candy.” Phil said.

They had their usual fun and adventures together before they had to be split up and go home. When Kimi and Chucky returned home with their family, Kimi lifted up her dress that was only covering the upper part of her belly now. Chas has Chucky for now and Kira was in the living room with her daughter. Then she noticed something happening. The blue coloring of her upper body started to spread down. It was slow but noticeable. Kimi wasn’t worried about it when she noticed it.

“Come here Kimi.” Kira said.

Kimi waddled over to her mother and was picked up. Kira examined her daughter and knew her daughter has begun to transform completely into a blueberry. She was worried and knew it was going to finish soon. Kimi stayed next to her mother and liked being with her. While doing so, the blue coloring spread a little faster than before. When they were about to go to bed, Kira looked at Kimi and saw that she was completely blue. She looked her over and found nothing wrong with her despite her strange coloration and full of blueberry juice. Kira made sure Kimi was comfortable and safe in her bed before leaving.
15411212.title: Kimi turns completely blue

choices: Kira wants to see how big her daughter could get
154112121.content:
Kimi got adjusted to her new life as a blueberry and liked it. Kira was still worried about what happened to her daughter but was getting use to it. She kept an eye on her at all the time incase the worse happens. Kimi kept going on like normal with the fact that it was somewhat hard to walk a bit but she doesn’t mind it a whole lot. When she walks, she keeps her arms out to her side to help her keep her balance and she could feel all the juices in her swishing around in her making it a little hard to keep her balance.

“Is it really hard to get around?” Chuckie asked.

“A bit but the hardest is getting up and such.” Kimi said.

Kimi and the others went on with their playtime unaware that Kimi was going to get bigger. When they had to leave, Kira grabbed Kimi and felt her body was a little heavier. She didn’t know what caused it but guessed she has a little more juice in her. When they got home, Kira decided to weigh and measure her. She was nearly 3 feet around at her widest area and weighed in nearly at 70 pounds. This was worrying Kira for she knew she might not be able to help her daughter if things go bad. Kira took her out back and sat down while Kimi waddled around.

“So full, I wonder how big ill get?” Kimi asked herself.

Then Kimi heard a bubbling sound coming from in her. She then felt what seem to be bubbles popping in her and she had a bad feeling. Kira looked up from the book she was reading and looked at her daughter. Kimi started to waddle over to her mother but was stopped mid way. Kira then watched as her daughter began to balloon up bigger. It didn’t take long before her little feet were off the ground and unusable. Her hands were soon in the same condition and all Kira could do is just watch for now as her daughter blew up. It was a somewhat slow process but she was expanding a good foot a minute at least. She just let it happen and hoped Kimi doesn’t explode. She kept growing until she was 10 feet around. At this size, Kimi’s dress and diaper were in tacked but stretched out to their limits. Kira knew that if her daughter got any bigger, her clothes would be gone completely. She made sure Kimi remain calm and comfortable. She even got ready if her clothes do rip off.
154112121.title: Kimi swells up some more

choices: Kimi starts to swell up again
Kira gets an idea for the juice
1541121211.content:
With Kimi now a complete blueberry, it was now time to juice her. The question is how will it be done. Then Kira remembered she had a friend in town whose daughter went through the same thing. She owned a candy factory so that could work. What’s got Kira worried about this is not that the fact that her daughter is a blueberry but what will happen to Kimi while she’s being juiced and it goes wrong or if she would let her remain would cause her to explode.

“You should call your friend to come help Kimi.” Chas said.

Kira did and she got there with a truck. The carefully loaded Kimi into the back and took off. They were careful not to lose her or pop her on the way and hoped that she was going to be saved. They ensured that Kimi was perfectly fine and got her there safely. She waddled in for she can smell the candy in it. It was a struggle but she managed to get inside before stopping due to how hard it was to move.

“Let me roll you, Kimi.” Kira said.

Kira gently rolled her daughter to the juicing room and felt her getting heavier and heavier the more she pushed. When they got to the juicing room, they got her hooked up. The machine was going to press on her until the juice was out. The reason Kimi was getting heavier was because she swelled up to now 15 feet around. After a few minutes, Kimi was completely juiced and ready to go home. She was still blue and most likely be that way for the rest of her life. That didn’t bother them for Kira was just glad Kimi wasn’t a blueberry bomb.
1541121211.title: Kimi gets juiced

choices: Chas finds a way to help Kimi
Kira finds the candy she ate
1541121212.content:
Kira looked at her daughter over again to see if anything was wrong and to ensure her safety. Looking at her now after what happened to Kimi over the last couple of days, she was glad that she was all right. Looking at her now, she actually liked how her daughter looks.

“You look much cuter than you were before. I hope you taste as great as you look.” Kira said.

Kimi smiled and felt her mother rub her large belly. Kira told Chad everything and how she wants to see her daughter’s limits.

“Ok, I just don’t want anything to happen to her that would harm her in any way.” Chad said.

Chucky soon came out and looked at his sister. He couldn’t believe how blue and big she is. Kimi looked at him and smiled. He felt her belly and asked if she could move. Kimi tried to and managed to get up barely off the ground and waddled around with a struggle. She soon stopped for the weight was a bit much for her. Kira stayed with her daughter to keep an eye on her and to ensure she is fine and nothing bad happens. Seeing her so big, Kira knew that her daughter was going to get bigger. It didn’t take long before doing so and Kira saw Kimi’s clothes were getting tight on her. This made Kimi a little uncomfortable, as she got bigger and her clothes getting tighter. It was getting obvious that this one was going to make Kimi the biggest yet.

“So full, I can’t believe I’m so big.” Kimi said.

Kira felt her daughter while she expanded and felt her skin stretching as it happened. She then put her ear to her belly and heard bubbling in there. Kimi continued to grow until she nearly doubled in size. They both knew that if she got any bigger, she would be completely naked outside. This worried Kira so she rolled her daughter as best she could into their living room to ensure her nudity isn’t seen by the neighbors or passing eyes.
1541121212.title: Kira wants to see how big her daughter could get

15413.content:
Kimi decided to go deeper into the mall. She knew her mother wouldn’t know or find out so she made her way out of the play area and wondered deep into the mall. She didn’t know what to expect but was a bit overwhelmed by how big and crowded the mall was. After a few minutes of wondering, Kimi couldn’t figure out where she was.

“Who’s kid is that?” One person said.

“She maybe just lost.” Another said.

Kimi ignored them and continued on with her adventure. She liked all the bright lights and such with all the people there. No one stoped to report her and take her back to her parents. Kimi kept wondering until she came across something. What she found was…
15413.title: Deeper into the mall...

154131.content:
…a candy stand. She was curious about that and wondered over to the stand. No one was there so she still looked. She saw all the candy there and wondered what to try first. While looking around, she saw a deep blue candy on the counter.

“I wonder what this candy tastes like.” Kimi asked.

She put the blue candy into her mouth and sucked on it. The taste of it was amazing to her and tried to figure out what the taste was. She didn’t bother to try anymore and just enjoyed the sweet candy. Kimi sat behind the stand and enjoyed the candy until she heard someone coming. She knew that this was an empty part of the mall and very few people in this part of it. So she looked and saw…
154131.title: A candy stand

1541311.content:
…Her mother coming that way. She was worried about Kimi and was looking frantically for her. Kimi was still sucking away at the candy while heading over to her mother.

“There you are Kimi. Don’t wonder off like that.” Kira said.

Kira decided to keep her daughter close the rest of the time. Kimi held tight to her mother the whole time and knew that her mother wouldn’t let her go. Kira didn’t notice that her daughter was eating some kind of candy that they were unaware of what’s going to happen soon.

“This candy is so sweet. What is this flavor?” Kimi thought.

She kept at the candy and loved each and every second of it. When they finished at the mall, Kira took Kimi home and checked her over to see if she was all right. She was glad that Kimi was safe and with her. They went aware that the candy that Kimi was eating happened to be one that would turn her into a blueberry. The rest of the gang showed up soon after and went on with their adventures.
1541311.title: her mother

15413112.content:
After the rest left and gone home for the night, Kimi felt a little strange. Despite the fact that she hasn’t eaten yet, she felt quite full. On top of that, she felt quite bloated and about to burst. She liked it and Chuckie was wondering what’s going on.

“Don’t worry about me. It’s this candy I found at the mall earlier.” Kimi said.

Kira came and took Chuckie to spend some time with him. Chaz watched over Kimi while Kira had his son. They weren’t aware of what’s going on with Kimi and still don’t know about the candy that she found. Soon Kimi felt the feeling she had get a little more intense. She put her hands onto her belly and felt it beginning to expand. Chaz didn’t notice for he was watching TV. Her dress started to lift up off her belly exposing it between her dress and diaper. Her short legs started to do so as well a bit and that was making Kimi feel a little strange. When she felt like her diaper was about to burst off her, she stopped bloating up. Kimi waddled over to Chaz who finally noticed what happened to her. Kira soon showed up and saw what happened to her daughter.
15413112.title: Kimi starts to swell up

choices: Kira wants to try something with Kimi
154131122.content:
With Kimi now swollen up like a balloon, they had to figure out what’s going. She hadn’t grown much since and they were glad that she hadn’t. They just thought she was somehow gotten fatter but due to how light she was still. They couldn’t figure it out and just hoped her bloating goes away. Of course, that wasn’t going to happen any time soon.

“Let’s get you into your bath.” Kira said.

Kira got her daughter undressed and cleaned up. Later when she was about to put her to bed, Kira noticed something. There was a spot on Kimi’s nose that she thought she missed. She tried to get it off but couldn’t. It was a blue dot and it began to spread across her face and down her body.

“This isn’t good.” Kira said.

The blue coloring spread all over Kimi’s body and colored her clothes and such in the same blue coloring before turning a rich violet. Looking at how bloated and now blue Kimi is, she could only be doing one thing. Kira figured out that her daughter is turning into a blueberry. She hopes that she is turning into a blueberry and not a blueberry juice bomb. She put Kimi to bed and would keep a close eye on her.
154131122.title: Kimi tarts to turn blue

choices: Kimi gets bigger to her limits
1541311221.content:
With Kimi a blueberry now, Kira kept watch over her daughter. She wondered what’s going on and how this happened. Kimi looked at her mother and knew she was trying to figure out what’s going on. Soon Kira figured it out. She found remains of a candy that Kimi ate that turned her into what she is now.

“I see this turned you into my little blueberry. But I’m not completely sure unless I try.” Kira said.

Kira got a couple more and got ready. She had Kimi a couple more and she did. After a moment, Kira watched her daughter become bigger. She smiled and knew she figured out what’s causing this. Seeing her like this, Kira got an idea. She remembered seeing a movie where a girl was turned into a large blueberry version of herself before being rolled into a juicing room.

“You want to do what to Kimi?” Chaz asked

“From the movie I watched the other night; they rolled a girl that turned into a blueberry to a juicing room. I want to possibly juice her and sell what we can get.” Kira said.

“That does sound good and we could use the money.”

Kira kept an eye on Kimi so she doesn’t get harmed or pop. She can tell if and when she was ripe and she wasn’t. It will be a while and could rush ripe her but decided to let it go naturally. Natural blueberry juice can sell for about $7 a bottle so decided to sell it for $10 a gallon. When it comes out, they would bottle it and sell it.
1541311221.title: Kira wants to try something with Kimi

choices: She eats a piece of candy
1542.content:
Kimi and the others were at a candy factory on a tour which was going good. While in one of the rooms, everyone was looking around at what inventions that were still being worked on. Soon everyone was leaving after the tour of the room but Chuckie and Kimi. They were left behind and they couldn’t find anyone.

“This isn’t good.” Chuckie said.

“Don’t worry Chuckie. I’m sure they’ll come back.” Kimi said.

They looked around a little more and liked what the owner had made. Chuckie did still not like this but Kimi was enjoying this. All the machines and other things were quite amazing and she liked them all. Of course being the curious girl she can be a times, she wanted to try something. The question was what would be the first thing she going to try.
1542.title: Story 2

15421.content:
While looking around the different things to try, Kimi soon found some gum. She smiled and put it into her mouth. Chuckie saw her and wanted her to spit it out.

“Why do you want me to do that?” Kimi asked.

“You don’t know what it does. Plus the owner said that these were all in testing still and doesn’t know what to do.” Chuckie said.

The gum was quite plain to her and she doesn’t want to keep chewing it. She was about to spit it out but then tasted something. She kept chewing and said it tasted like yummy food. She tried to tell him what it was but it was a little hard. They didn’t see what was wrong with this and hoped he could try it soon. Until then, Kimi had the only piece to eat off.
15421.title: She finds some gum

154211.content:
With Kimi still chewing the gum, she was enjoying the tasty food she tasted. She soon realized that she didn’t just taste it but was actually eating it. Her belly was quite full from it and filling up as well as pushing out. She couldn’t help but chew the gum. She kept doing so and that was causing to fill up more and more.

“I think you should stop chewing it.” Chuckie said.

“I wish I could but it’s too good for me to do so.” Kimi said.

Despite how full she was, Kimi couldn’t stop chewing the gum. She felt like she was going to burst from it but didn’t mind. She was holding her belly from all the tastiness but one thing she wasn't expecting was about to happen. She felt something within her full belly that wasn’t good. It felt like she was about to start expanding but that was possibly from the gum.

“You look like you might pop. I think you should stop.” Chuckie said.

“I want to but I can’t.” Kimi said.

She hoped that something doesn’t go wrong for she wants to return to the others if they come back. Until then, they just looked around and hoped that the others come for them.
154211.title: Kimi feels a little strange

1542112.content:
Kimi didn’t like how she was feeling but shrugged it off as just her being full and still filling from it. Soon she felt like the expanding feeling all over and looked at her body. She then watched as her tummy began to swell out. She rubbed it and soon the rest of her beginning to expand like that.

“This isn’t right.” Kimi said.

“You look like you might pop.” Chuckie said.

She kept swelling bigger and bigger until she was as big as a beach ball. She had stopped for now but felt like she was possibly going to get bigger at any moment. During the whole thing, Kimi was panicking for she could only imagine balloons inflating and popping at their limits. She feared that would happen to her but hoped that whatever’s in her is let out before then.
1542112.title: She starts swelling

choices: Chuckie takes it upon himself to roll Kimi
Kimi is found and rolled by a member of the factory
15421122.content:
Kimi pressed into her belly as if pressing it down would make it physically smaller, but she struggled to suck it all in. Instead, the belly grew larger and Kimi herself started to... giggle?

"What's so funny? You're turning into a big balloon!" Chuckie protested as he was frozen in place, worried that Kimi may end up popping like a balloon.

"It feels good~!" Kimi cried out with glee. "I wanna get bigger!" she smiled as she took a deep breath out, causing her dress to burst its seams in some places. Chuckie shook his head still in protest.

"B-Bigger? But you'll asplode!"

"Babies don't asplode, silly!" Kimi's giggles still punctuated she was having a better time than Chuckie before she ended up a complete sphere. Her diaper pressed against the ground and caused her feet to rise it, making her almost immobile. "Ngh... I can't move!" Kimi kicked her feet. Her yellow dress exposed a good section of her stomach, her diaper still snug on her lower half. "It feels fun but I don't know how I can move!"
15421122.title: Kimi gets bigger

info.brief_description: Turn any of your favorite babies from Rugrats into a blueberry or any other fruit.
info.description:
Rules:

1: Excellent Grammar
2: More then just one paragraph
3: Excellent sentences
4: Only the baby characters can be turned into a blueberry
5: Keep it clean
6: ripped clothes are allowed when the Blueberry Transformation happens
7: The Blueberry Transformation must be slowly with Details
8: Blueberries are not the only fruit inflation allowed. That means you can have strawberry, grape and other types of fruit to inflate the babies.
9: Have fun!
